data.text:
@gillianoberholzer 

I spoke to Neil and he showed me the email of Shaun regarding the issue.
The above description is confusing.

The record must not be removed. It must be fixed by an Admin because a defendant is missing on the record.

Please use "289349" on the case editor to fix the record so that it gets extracted to the Bureaus again.

Neil mentioned that he will make the Change himself.
